title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Built a complete e-commerce platform with product management, shopping cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard.
longDescription: Developed a full-featured e-commerce solution with Stripe payment integration, real-time inventory management, order tracking, and comprehensive admin panel. Implemented responsive design, SEO optimization, and performance enhancements for optimal user experience.
features: Product catalog with search and filters

testimonial.text: Praneeth delivered an exceptional e-commerce platform that exceeded our expectations. Professional, timely, and highly skilled.
testimonial.author: Sarah Johnson

title: Job Portal Platform
description: Comprehensive job portal connecting employers with job seekers, featuring advanced search, application tracking, and resume management.
longDescription: Full-featured job portal with separate dashboards for recruiters and candidates. Implemented advanced job search with filters, application tracking system, resume upload and management, and email notifications.

testimonial.text: The job portal exceeded our requirements. Clean code, great UI, and excellent communication throughout the project.
testimonial.author: Michael Chen

title: Restaurant Website & Ordering System
description: Modern restaurant website with online ordering, menu management, and reservation system.
longDescription: Developed a comprehensive restaurant website featuring online food ordering, table reservations, menu management, and integration with payment gateways. Implemented real-time order tracking, customer reviews, and admin dashboard.

testimonial.text: Our online orders increased by 40% after launching this website. Praneeth's work is outstanding!
testimonial.author: David Martinez

title: Real Estate Listing Platform
description: Property listing platform with advanced search, virtual tours, and agent management system.
longDescription: Built a comprehensive real estate platform featuring property listings with high-quality images, virtual tour integration, advanced search filters, agent profiles, and inquiry management. Implemented map integration and mortgage calculator.

testimonial.text: The platform transformed our business. Professional development and great attention to detail.
testimonial.author: Jennifer Williams

title: Fitness Tracking Mobile App
description: Cross-platform fitness app with workout tracking, nutrition planning, and progress analytics.
longDescription: Developed a comprehensive fitness tracking application with workout plans, exercise library, nutrition tracking, progress analytics, and social features. Implemented real-time sync, offline mode, and integration with wearable devices.

testimonial.text: Praneeth built an amazing fitness app that our users love. Highly recommended!
testimonial.author: Alex Thompson

title: Custom Blog CMS Platform
description: Custom content management system for blogs with SEO optimization, analytics, and multi-author support.
longDescription: Built a powerful CMS platform specifically designed for bloggers and content creators. Features include rich text editor, media management, SEO tools, analytics dashboard, multi-author support, and automated social media posting.

testimonial.text: The CMS is intuitive and powerful. Our content team loves it!
testimonial.author: Emily Roberts
